nodes.bodyText: Could be simplified to use getExecutionEnvironment(Configuration)

I'm doing this just to nitpick, because I think style doesn't matter unless it's enforced:
I think out style guide says to use two indentation levels for parameters. The .editorconfig file was recently changed to break this so I suggest to use a good .editorconfig file and ignore the one in git using git update-index --skip-worktree .editorconfig.
